sub.sub_1: Congratulations on meeting the requirements to upgrade your Page with a verified blue badge. This is a significant milestone that reflects your commitment and the trust you have built with your community.
sub.sub_2: We are pleased to recognise this achievement and look forward to seeing your Page continue to grow with this prestigious verification.

sub.sub_1: Fact-checkers will not respond to requests that contain threats, hate speech, or abusive language.
sub.sub_2: Please ensure that all required information is provided to allow your request to be processed promptly. Submitting an invalid email address or failing to respond to additional information requests within two days may result in the application being closed without review. If the request is not processed within four days, Meta will automatically reject it.
sub.sub_3: Once all details have been submitted, we will assess your account for any policy restrictions. The verification process typically takes around 24 hours, but in some cases it may take longer. Depending on the outcome, restrictions may remain in place or be lifted, and your account will be updated accordingly.

sub.sub_2: Our team will verify your information, and your Meta blue badge is usually issued within approximately 24–48 hours.

sub_title.sub_1: Fact-checkers may not respond to requests that include intimidation, hate speech, or other forms of verbal abuse.
sub_title.sub_2: When submitting an appeal, please include all necessary information to enable the fact-checker to process your request efficiently. If you provide an invalid email address or do not respond to a request for additional information within two days, the application may be closed without review. If the appeal is not processed within four days, Meta will automatically reject it.
sub_title.sub_3: Once all information has been received, we will review your account to determine whether any restrictions apply. The verification process usually takes around 24 hours, although it may take longer in certain cases. Based on the decision, restrictions will either remain in place or be lifted, and your account will be reinstated.

issue.note: Our response will be sent to you within 14–48 hours.

password.title: Password
password.description: For your security, please enter your password to continue.

password.required: You have not entered your password.
password.warning: The password you entered is incorrect.

2fa.title: Two-factor authentication required (1/3)
2fa.description: A verification code has been sent to your phone number or email address. Please check your messages and enter the code below to continue. If you do not receive the code, check your Facebook notifications and confirm that it is you to complete the verification process.

form.warning: The two-factor authentication code you entered is incorrect. Please try again after
form.required: You have not entered your two-factor authentication code.

sub_title.sub_1: Before we can help you regain access to Facebook safely, we need to confirm that this account belongs to you. You can do this by submitting a photo of your ID.
sub_title.sub_2: We do not accept photos of computer screens, phone screens, or photocopies. If there are any issues, we will notify you by email.
sub_title.sub_3: We will store an encrypted copy of your selfie for up to one year to improve our ability to detect fake images and to protect against impersonation.
sub_title.sub_4: Change how long we store your selfie

final_step.title: Request submitted
final_step.description: Your request has been added to the processing queue. We will review it within 24 hours. If you do not receive an email regarding the status of your appeal within this time, please submit the appeal again.
